fields.label: Instruction
fields.name: instruction
fields.instructions: Add an instruction for this rich content. It may not be required. Won't show if empty.

fields.label: Content Type
fields.name: content_type
fields.instructions: Choose the type of content you wish to generate

fields.label: Accordion style
fields.name: accordion_style
fields.instructions: Choose a style, expand or dissolve

fields.label: Accordion Content
fields.name: accordion_content
fields.instructions: Create the Sections by adding new fields

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add the text content for your section header

sub_fields.label: Collapsed Content
sub_fields.name: collapsed_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add the content that is to be hidden and shown here

fields.label: Tab settings
fields.name: tab_settings
fields.instructions: Choose the style of tabs you want

fields.label: Tab Content
fields.name: tab_content
fields.instructions: Add the content for each tabbed area

sub_fields.label: Card Type
sub_fields.name: card_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the card title header

fields.label: Tables should be built with the following structure

sub_fields.label: Prepend
sub_fields.name: prepend
sub_fields.instructions: Choose what sort of feature you want at the start of this text string

sub_fields.label: Append
sub_fields.name: append
sub_fields.instructions:
Choose what sort of feature you want at the end of this text string.
  • Nothing - The next text string becomes next part of this word
  • single_space : Single space - next text string becomes part of a new word
  • line_break : Line Break - Put the next text string on a new line
  • arrow : Arrow - A space and an arrow and another space separate the text strings
  • end : End - this is the last text string in the content

sub_fields.label: Tooltip information
sub_fields.name: tooltip_information
sub_fields.instructions:
What's the text in the hover box going to say.
If you don't want this text string to have a hover effect, leave this blank.

sub_fields.label: Hover colour
sub_fields.name: hover_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a colour state for the text string when hovered.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: quadrant_title
sub_fields.instructions: Quadrant title

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: quadrant_text
sub_fields.instructions: Quadrant text is revealed on hover

sub_fields.label: Image tile
sub_fields.name: image_tile
sub_fields.instructions: Select an image that will reveal it title when hovered or clicked on it. Ensure all images are the same aspect ratio.

sub_fields.label: Image tile title
sub_fields.name: image_tile_title
sub_fields.instructions: This should be a short description, a couple of words.

fields.label: Image title reveal aspect
fields.name: image_title_reveal_aspect
fields.instructions: Select if you wish to have the title of the revealed images to be horizontal or vertical. If your images are in portrait mode, they will work better horizontally and conversely as landscape images.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: awi_title
sub_fields.instructions: This is the activating section

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: awi_content
sub_fields.instructions: This is the content that is revealed when the title is activated

sub_fields.label: Section colour
sub_fields.name: awi_section_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a differentiate the section from other sections. RMIT brand colours are used, they should appear in your image also for continuity.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: awi_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will be overlaid on the background image when the section is active. The layer order will be determined by the order of the sections.

fields.label: Background image
fields.name: awi_background_image
fields.instructions: Select a background image that will appear persistently next to the collapsable buttons

fields.label: Carousel Content
fields.name: carousel_content
fields.instructions: Add content for each slide

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: carousel_image
sub_fields.instructions: Images will be centered. Ensure all images are the same aspect ratio

sub_fields.label: Content title
sub_fields.name: carousel_content_title
sub_fields.instructions: What's the title of this section? Required for accessibility

fields.label: Carousel options
fields.name: carousel_options
fields.instructions: Do you want the carousel content to fill the width of the frame? Useful if embedding non-text content in the carousel frame like tables.

sub_fields.label: Question
sub_fields.name: question
sub_fields.instructions: Enter your question in a way that can be answered across the scale of "Strongly agree" (2 points) to "Strongly disagree" (-2 points)

sub_fields.label: Outcomes
sub_fields.name: outcomes
sub_fields.instructions: Build as many outcomes as you require to represent answer options

sub_fields.label: Course title
sub_fields.name: course_title
sub_fields.instructions: eg: "introduction to service delivery in aged care sector"

sub_fields.label: Course codes
sub_fields.name: course_codes
sub_fields.instructions: eg: "CHCCOM005, CHCDIV001, CHCLEG001, and HLTWHS002"

sub_fields.label: School
sub_fields.name: school
sub_fields.instructions: eg: "School of Global, Urban, and Social Studies"

sub_fields.label: Em dash colour
sub_fields.name: em_dash_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose from one of the RMIT colours

sub_fields.label: Text colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: What colour do you need the text to be on the banner. Think readability.

fields.label: Table options
fields.name: table_options
fields.instructions: If there is a table on this page, how would you like it styled? For best results use this tool - http://www.tablestrap.com/#tables

fields.label: Custom HTML or Table
fields.name: custom_html
fields.instructions: Enter your HTML here

fields.label: Hotspot background
fields.name: hotspot_background
fields.instructions: Select an image to be used for hotspots. Make sure it's a ladnscape ratio of 1/1.4142. Or 1400 pixels wide and 1000 pixels high.

sub_fields.label: X location
sub_fields.name: x_location
sub_fields.instructions: This determines on the X-axis where this hotspot will appear

sub_fields.label: Y location
sub_fields.name: y_location
sub_fields.instructions: This determines on the Y-axis where this hotspot will appear

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: The title of this section..

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Will appear on the left of this card. Use a transparent background square PNG for best results.

sub_fields.label: Front text
sub_fields.name: front_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text will appear centred on the card, with an image, overlaid. Don't use links - they won't be accessible.

sub_fields.label: Front image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Best to use an image that is the same size as the card content on the back. Square and landscape images work best if you're including text underneath.

sub_fields.label: Rear text
sub_fields.name: rear_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text will appear centred on the card, with an image, overlaid.

sub_fields.label: Rear image
sub_fields.name: rear_image
sub_fields.instructions: Best to use an image that is the same size as the card content on the back.

fields.label: Front card font size
fields.name: front_card_font_size
fields.instructions: Depending on the number of words on the card choose which option will look best

fields.label: Rear card font size
fields.name: rear_card_font_size_copy
fields.instructions: Depending on the number of words on the card choose which option will look best

fields.label: Student File Download
fields.name: student_file_download
fields.instructions: Select a file for the student to download.

fields.label: Animation file
fields.name: animation_file
fields.instructions: Upload a json file that contains the animation. You need to generate this file using the After Effects Bodymovin plugin as outlined here: http://github.com/airbnb/lottie-web

fields.label: Animation loop
fields.name: animation_loop
fields.instructions: Do you want your animation to loop?

fields.label: Imagemap
fields.name: imagemap
fields.instructions: Upload and select an SVG to apply tooltips to.

fields.label: Imagemap tooltips
fields.name: Tooltips
fields.instructions: When building SVGs in Illustrator ensure the layer name of the element is applied. The Path ID (see below) needs to match the case of this.

sub_fields.label: Path ID
sub_fields.name: path_id
sub_fields.instructions: Provide the path id for the element you wish to apply a tooltip to. You can name this ID in illustrator or find the ID by opening the SVG in a text editor. This field is case sensitive

sub_fields.label: Hover information
sub_fields.name: hover_information
sub_fields.instructions: What information do you want to appear in the tooltip for this path id?

sub_fields.label: Image link
sub_fields.name: image_link
sub_fields.instructions: If you want the user to navigate somewhere click on this link

fields.label: Custom Code
fields.name: custom_code
fields.instructions: If you need to include custom code to format your rich content further, select "Yes". CSS and JS will be added to the bottom of the page. If you're not sure, select no.

fields.label: Custom CSS
fields.name: custom_css
fields.instructions: Enter your custom CSS here

fields.label: Custom JavaScript
fields.name: custom_javascript
fields.instructions: Enter you custom Javascript here

fields.label: Chart Type
fields.name: chart_type
fields.instructions: Select the chart type you wish to display.

fields.label: Chart content label
fields.name: chart_content_label
fields.instructions: What does the data represent: Number of people? Percentage of votes?

fields.label: Chart X label
fields.name: chart_y_label
fields.instructions: If the chart content isn't clearly represented elsewhere you may affix a label here.

sub_fields.label: Data title
sub_fields.name: data_title
sub_fields.instructions: What the name of this series?

fields.label: Chart source title
fields.name: chart_source_title
fields.instructions: You really should include a source for the data represented in the chart.

fields.label: Chart source
fields.name: chart_source
fields.instructions: Where can students get more info on this data? Provide a link.

fields.label: Checklist size
fields.name: checklist_size
fields.instructions: How large do you want the checklist font to be? For short words text areas use small, for longer words use large.

sub_fields.label: color
sub_fields.name: stl_color
sub_fields.instructions: Pale colours are best

sub_fields.label: Scale
sub_fields.name: scale
sub_fields.instructions: Scale your model. You may need a larger number if this is a small object

sub_fields.label: Postion X
sub_fields.name: postion-x
sub_fields.instructions: You may need to move the model if you have multiple models. This moves the model in the X axis

sub_fields.label: Postion Y
sub_fields.name: postion-y
sub_fields.instructions: You may need to move the model if you have multiple models. This moves the model in the Y axis

sub_fields.label: Postion Z
sub_fields.name: postion-z
sub_fields.instructions: You may need to move the model if you have multiple models. This moves the model in the Z axis

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: Required for accessibility

sub_fields.label: trigger
sub_fields.name: trigger
sub_fields.instructions: what happens when this item is clicked

sub_fields.label: Question image
sub_fields.name: question_image
sub_fields.instructions: Not required

sub_fields.label: Answers
sub_fields.name: answers
sub_fields.instructions: At least one answer is required

sub_fields.label: Question type
sub_fields.name: question_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select if you want the student to be able to select

sub_fields.label: Correct Feedback
sub_fields.name: correct_feedback
sub_fields.instructions: Feedback for the correct answer

sub_fields.label: Incorrect feedback
sub_fields.name: incorrect_feedback
sub_fields.instructions: What to tell the student if they have given an incorrect answer

fields.label: Accordion action
fields.name: accordion_action
fields.instructions: Choose how you want the the accordions to open

fields.label: Branching scenario
fields.name: branching_scenario
fields.instructions: Choose a branching scenario to insert in this page

fields.label: Managers
fields.name: staff_level1
fields.instructions: Please add the managers

sub_fields.label: Staff
sub_fields.name: staff_level2
sub_fields.instructions: Add staff directly reporting to this manager
